meanings.definition: Relating to or based on physicalism.
meanings.sent1: The physicalistic approach focuses on the tangible aspects of reality.
meanings.sent2: She has a physicalistic view of the world, valuing only what can be seen and touched.
meanings.sent3: In a physicalistic world, even emotions would have a weight and color.
meanings.sent4: His physicalistic mindset sees the universe as a giant machine.
meanings.sent5: The physicalistic theory suggests that everything can be explained through physical processes.

meanings.definition: Believing in or adhering to physicalism.
meanings.sent1: Their physicalistic beliefs reject any form of supernatural explanations.
meanings.sent2: Being physicalistic, he dismisses any notion of a soul separate from the body.
meanings.sent3: The physicalistic thinker humorously argues that ghosts must also follow physical laws.
meanings.sent4: She took a physicalistic approach to spirituality, seeking answers in the material world.
meanings.sent5: The physicalistic perspective sees the mind as a product of the brain's physical processes.
